website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and exceptionally comfortable. A budget-friendly option perfect for those who practically live in their slippers.
pros: Boasts a robust, extra chunky rubber sole that easily stands up to outdoor wear
Suede exterior with a generous faux fur inner lining is plush, warm, and comfy
cons: Sizes run a bit small, so ordering a size up is recommended

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but SIZE UP! I normally wear an 8.5 (sometime 9 in sandals because I like to have my heal not at the edge). I originally ordered a 9 and had to send them back, the 10 fits great! They're so soft and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: So. Comfy. So. Practical.
customer_reviews.text: We are a “no shoes in the house” family, so finding the perfect house slipper has been my quest for quite some time. It must have a no-slip sole & be comfy enough to wear from the moment I walk in until I go to bed at midnight. Yeah, found it. This is squishy, keeps my toes warm, and most importantly, has a waterproof sole so I can mop the floors in it. Granted, I’ve only had them for a couple weeks, so I don’t know how long they will last... but they seem durable. I promise you’ll hear back if they don’t make it past 6 months. I wear them 6 hours a day every day.
customer_reviews.author: ThereSheGoesShoppingAgain

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Super Soft/Comfy Slipper
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and quiet when walking. I like that the sole is solid with grip but not clackity sounding when I walk on tile. Great slipper for the price. I am going to buy the other colors, but love this silvery gray.... Great item for keeping my toes warm while I work (at home medical transcription). Super easy to slip on too and does not feel like it will come off like some clogs do (with or without socks). I am super glad I found this!!
customer_reviews.author: Farmerz Daughter

customer_reviews.title: as I like to wear socks in them
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 usually, and ordered size 8, based on reviews. I returned these, as I like to wear socks in them, and were too small. If you like to wear socks in them, I would order two sizes up from your usual size. I did not reorder in a size 9, as the toebox is not wide enough and because the bottoms are made of a "plastic material, not rubber, and looked like they would be extremely slippery!
customer_reviews.author: theresa grannis

customer_reviews.title: The most uncomfortable slipper I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable slippers I've ever had. They're hard overall, especially the soles, so there's no flexing at all and my toes would hit the front end. Size runs small, too, my heels reached the edge even though I'm a 7.5 and ordered size 8. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Yashoda

customer_reviews.title: Cinderella Slipper - Just Fits
customer_reviews.text: The slipper fits on my foot; just barely. I am a size 8 Woman's Foot and it just fits. There was no 'extra' length behind heel. So while it fits and is comfortable, and has a nice sole, just be aware it fits "EXACTLY" to size. A 8-1/2 will hang over a size 8. Order to size. If you think it will be too tight go 1/2 size up. But overal comfy
customer_reviews.author: Sheila T. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: ORDER ONE SIZE UP!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got these for me for Christmas, but gave them to me early as my old Uggs fell apart. I usually wear Uggs, but these were a great price and are just as comfortable if not more comfortable. Only problem I have is it is not a true size 12. I always order size 11/12 or 12 slippers and they fit great. But my whole heel is sticking off the back of these!! I have to deal with it though since there isn't a size bigger. I do recommend these though because they are soft and comfortable. Just make sure you order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: John abell

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you go up a size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom...she needed something with a good nonslip sole. Sent them to her as a gift, after she fell wearing a none brand "cute" leopard print "I gotta have'em" anyway (even if there too big) pair of house shoes....Well, she was surprised and in love. She couldn't wait to send me a picture! She said they fit well..She wears an 8 but, I bought her a 9 and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these slippers! They're warm and comfortable, and I like that the faux fur means they won't start to stink in a couple months like the ones these are replacing. If I could change one thing, it would be the flexibility of the soles. While they're comfortable and non-slip, they are a bit hard and not very flexible. Other than that minor thing, I really enjoy these, and I think they were an excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EGS

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in shoes. Thanks to the other reviewers who suggested sizing up, I am glad I did just that. The 10 is perfect with a half inch to spare at the heel. Although this house shoe is not a very flattering design for a slender feminine foot, the the comfort level is extraordinary! My feet fit snuggly into the shoe which covers very well for added warmth. I would purchase again but id love to see less of a rugged style.
customer_reviews.author: AngeLight

customer_reviews.title: They're alright
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife so I'm paraphrasing... She likes them, but she certainly doesn't love them. In terms of an outside slipper, they're kinda comfy, but not in the terms of an inside slipper. Don't purchase these if you're justing wanting something comfortable to lounge in around while inside cause they're definitely geared for outside use. There is a decent amount of tread on the bottom, however, that doesn't mean they have great traction and even after only a couple of days they are showing signs of long term use already. But, you get what you pay for! These are a good value for how much they cost. Size runs about as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew James

customer_reviews.title: The fur lining inside is very thin and feels silky like the fur of a cat or a rabbit
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute BUT beware that there is NO PADDING under the fur lined foot bed. The fur lining inside is very thin and feels silky like the fur of a cat or a rabbit. It's just the fur and the hard sole so it is hard on the heels and it feels well, kind of gross and cheap. The sole is thick and hard. It seems very durable. I will wear these to run out the trash, get the mail, stuff like that but they are not comfortable at all to wear around the house everyday. I am a true 7 1/2 and I ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly with no room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: SMarley

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Muk Luks. Save money! Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Not delivered on day stated for tracking purposes. Not the sellers fault. These slippers are amazing. My daughter loves them. Have the grey for myself and the sand color and black for my adult children. I had to buy them each a pair so they did not take mine. Buy a size up as they run a half size small. I wear a 9 and bought a 10 Kids wear an 8 and bought them a 9. They are also warm and are durable. Have washed my daughters about 4 times throughout the year and let them dry on top of the dryer and they look new! Forget the Muk Luks! Save your money and buy these slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Cimino

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in pink thinking they would make me smile, they did not. The tab in the front under the fur as well as the piping around the sole is more of a neon pink and does not match the faux suede at all. They are not very comfortable and they feel like they are made of cardboard. The synthetic rubber is plastic and not rubbery at all. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Eda-Marie Bicho

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: I was supper excited about these slippers , until I recived them .. they are made from very cheap materials. The soles are made from that cheap foam like material.. making them supper slippery when walking on carpet or wood flooring. I returned them . The size was true to size , the color was a bit lighter than they looked in pictures from other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic101

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, fab price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I have a 7.5 size foot and I bought the 8 - they work well, even with socks. They have a substantial of enough bottom that my foot does not sink in them, leaving no support (I often find that with slippers that claim to have a foamy/comfy bottom) - but not these! I have tile floors in my home and therefore I need something with a solid and supportive bottom. They were a bit stiff initially, but after wearing they move better. Your feet stay warm and feel cozy. I’ve worn others like it and they were quite expensive - this was a definite welcomed alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: SMELLY! Please read description:)
customer_reviews.text: SO! I’ve been wearing these since they arrived (approximately 5 hours). I kept smelling something fishy/urine like and I could not find the source. I started sniffing my couch cushions and went as far as to have my boyfriend smell my ass/crotch, as the smell was following me. It wasn’t me or my couch, but I washed the cushions anyways. While sitting Indian-style on the ground I got a strong whiff of the scent. For some reason I decided to smell the slippers, and BOOM found the source of the horrific scent. The slippers are comfortable and as expected but holy crap they smell horrible!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bissett

customer_reviews.title: Nice slipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a Christmas gift, but I decided not to give them to her and keep them (I bought her something different). My mom needs a wide shoe, and I didn't think these were wide enough. I don't wear a wide, and they fit me perfect, so I decided to keep them. They look nice, and feel comfy. My only complaint would be that they are heavy. When I walk I can feel the weight on them, and since they don't have a back you kind of feel it at the top of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a good Ugg doup and was excited for these slippers. The bottom is a weird sort of plastic with no give. They don’t bend at all and are super uncomfortable. Other than looking cute and being soft they’re terrible. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love these! On other reviews I read, before my purchase, people had complained about the stiff sole. I was apprehensive on ordering but I did any way! Am I ever happy! Yes when I received them the sole was stiff, after wearing for a few hours the sole had loosened up and boy are these so comfy! My new favs!! I purchased Kiwi heavy duty water resistant spray for these. I love to wear them indoors and outdoors around bonfires or just tooling around.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Feel like you are walking on a 2 x 4!
customer_reviews.text: No cushioning whatsoever! Very uncomfortable. It feels like you are walking barefoot on a 2 x 4 as they have no give! Wore for a few hours and couldn't stand it any longer. I don't know what type of slipper those who gave these higher marks normally wear, but they are not up to my standard for a comfortable slipper that I can wear around the house all day.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me...
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked the way these slippers fit, but as I used them I found that the sole was not smooth, had cleat-like bumps on the sole, and caused me to stumble. I do not recommend these slippers if you need a smooth sole.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great all around the house slipper
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife and it was to small for her size 8 foot so i ordered a 9. The 9 fit perfect and my daughter kept the size 8. The slipper does run small, due to the fur in the shoe i think. But after you get the correct pair that fits you will notice a nice supporting slipper. This is a all around the house slipper meaning going outside is not a problem. My girls love the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are the best I've ever had! I have plantar faciiatis and need to have arch support as well as my heal elevated a little. These clippers fill the bill. I paid 3 times what these cost and got a pair I can't wear. I wear a size 8-1/2 shoe, but since foot surgery some 8-1/2s are too tight. So I ordered the other pair in size 9. Wrong! The size 8 in these slippers fit perfectly! They're also very warm and cozy. I like that they come up high on my instep and keep me feet very warm. Now I wear them every minute I'm in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Wise shopper

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sleepers in March 2018 and have them for two years now. They've been washed multiple times in the washing machine. They still keep the form, the soles inside the slipper is still soft and comfy, the outside of the slipper is still presentable. Lasts much longer than other slippers I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kara mia

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Warm Slippers
customer_reviews.text: AS previous reviews mentioned the slippers are a bit stiff, meaning the top of the shoe part is very rigid. I have only worm for a few days so I am hopeful they will 'break in'. They are crazy warm, which I am sure I will appreciate come winter but for warm fall days my feet get too hot in them. The bottom sole is stiff and good for wearing outside to take the dog out and provides enough traction to not slip. Great slipper for the price (and they look nice too).
customer_reviews.author: Amy MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it! Order them!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive to order these, as I have an uncommon shoe size 🙄 (women’s 12, a bit on the wide side). But I took a shot, and ordered a 12. Sooo happy I did! They fit PERFECTLY! True to size. Super soft and fluffy fur on the inside, and best of all they’re just the right amount of snug to not flop or slide off my feet (which was another concern). Nice solid sole, not slip resistant, but that’s okay. I definitely see myself wearing these outside to check the mail, or even run to the convenient store. Definitely for school drop offs, pick ups, and such. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Braxton

customer_reviews.title: There is good and bad about these slippers
customer_reviews.text: The good -- the sole is hard and has great traction. The top is soft and comfortable. They look nice. The bad -- the sole is hard and does not have any real flexibility so you sort of trudge (think Herman Munster walk). The traction can catch on carpeting at times if you don't lift your feet. I got these because I had my feet wrapped and needed something I could wear outside and were a bit bigger than my shoes (I wear an 8 WW) and bought the 9. The width and size were good.
customer_reviews.author: DBudd

customer_reviews.title: Nice house shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are not squishy bedroom slippers. They’re more like shoes, sturdy enough to wear outside. As someone who’s hard on her footwear, I find them perfect. The plush inside made them very tight at first, but over time it compressed so now my feet fit perfectly. Others have complained about them being too hot, but that just makes them perfect for someone whose feet are always freezing. I’ve seen teen girls wearing these as outdoor shoes, they’re that sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Really great slippers!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great slippers! I’ve been trying to replace a pair of slippers I’d gotten as a gift. I’d never worn slippers before that and didn’t realize how varied they are. These have a very sturdy sole like a shoe but the inside is plush and soft. They’re so supportive I’ve forgotten that I wasn’t wearOMG regular shoes and left the house, wearing these to work! My boss ended up buying a pair for his wife because she also likes great slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: FITS 1 - 2 SIZES SMALLER OTHERWISE LOVED PRIOR LARGER PAIR
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this slipper once before and loved them so much, I wore them almost all the time. When I got paint on them, I decided to order a new pair. They were so short, I couldn't wear thin socks and with bare feet, I couldn't easily slide into them. Other than the size issue, they would be quite comfy and warm. The tread is that of a snow tire which is in my opinion, great thing, especially if you mindlessly leave the house in them.
customer_reviews.author: Social Graces, Sophistication & Refinement

customer_reviews.title: warm fuzzy not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: I loved these slippers immediately. My foot is narrow so I need a snug fit. I put them in the washer too. It doesn't hurt them. I've had them 3 months and my big toe cut a hole in the right one. I know they're not real suede but know I don't have long nails or get pedicures. It annoys me bc after 3 months this tells me they are going to wear easily. I prefer sheep shearling slippers the most but they're higher. I still love them though but hope they'll make them stronger. I'm not hard on shoes so .. the sole is good and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old pair of expensive Fireside slippers I wanted to replace, but couldn't find a good replacement. These are just the thing. Comfortable for around the house, yet I can run outside to the mailbox because of their rugged sole. I usually wear an 8, on an occasion an 8 1/2 . Because of other reviews I ordered a 9. Glad I did. These are just right. I have only worn them for a couple days, so while they seem very well made, I can't speak to how long they will hold up just yet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged. Sent in a ziploc bag. Not suitable for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these slippers twice prior. And they came beautifully shipped and in perfect condition. This time we purchased the pink choice and they look awful. It seems we received a return. Never again, we can't gift them. We will order something similar from Macy's cheaper and giftable and not in a ziploc bag.
customer_reviews.author: K diC

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are snug but comfy, like a tight hug in a good way. Even if I wear them with thick wool socks or without socks, they fit well either way. My feet tend to be cold all the time so that’s important. These are shown to be indoor or outdoor slippers but while the bottoms are thick and non-slippery, they are more of a foam than a rugged bottom to walk outdoors much. They are perfect for walking out to check the mail or grab something from your car, etc., though. I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bc i will be in the hospital in a couple months to have my baby girl. 4th child. Needed something to keep my feet warm and something comfortable to walk around in after my c-section... I made a good purchase with buying these. I usually wear between 8-8.5 ... I bought a size 9... Fits perfectly!!! So yes, size up if you purchase these. The bottom i originally thought was rubber is just hard plastic. Im not sure the right term for it but at least you can wear them outside if need be. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha W.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small, size up
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are well made with quality materials and very comfy, but they're at least a size smaller than what I need. I ordered 2 pair - one for myself and one for my daughter, whose foot is a size smaller than mine. Neither of us will be able to wear them. I don't do exchanges, so I'll be finding a friend with teeny tiny little pigs' feet. Be sure to order a size larger than you need; otherwise you'll be dealing with an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: OKHorseRescuer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were really cute and soft! They felt great on my feet and kept them warm when I needed it. The lining on the inside did get worn down and less soft and fluffy over time, although that was expected. I don't see these lasting for more than a year, however, due to the fact that the material it is made out of doesn't seem like the quality needed for lasting for a while. It wasn't a bad price for it, and they fit the purpose I needed them for, so I would recommend it to anyone looking for a cheap pair of pretty comfy shoes that are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great house shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and are warm and comfy. They have a great thick sole that if needed, I have no problem wearing them outside. I threw them in the washing machine when they became dirty and then into the dryer. They cleaned up very nicely and held up as if they are still new. I’m super happy with these and will buy another pair when it’s time.
customer_reviews.author: J Wat

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product as soon as I put them on. After wearing a few days, the fur is not as fluffy and the fit a bit loose. Still ok. I have struggled to find slippers that do not fall off my feet after wearing them for a few days. These slippers are ok. I find them a bit hard to walk in. I am hoping that will improve as I continue to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I am a perfect 7.5 and I ordered a size 8 and they look just like those expensive brand but I have to say that I would not trade them for anything! They are soft furry and so warm and comfy and I believe amazing arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Landysgranny

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these slippers for a trip. I wanted something comfortable to wear at the airport and I pretty much have worn them everywhere since. The some of the shoe is not the most comfortable because it has no padding. As expected the fur on the bottom goes flat after about a week but I think this is normal. As for sizing it is pretty close to "fit as expected." I have wide feet so I ordered a half size up but that's not even necessary because they ended up being a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Tom k

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Slippers, from previous ugg owner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mom for the holidays a few years back. They were great, she wore them so much here I am buying the replacement pair. The quality was superb. They lasted about two to three years like any real pair of house shoes you wear hard. If this is your price point, you won't be disappointed with what you get. Especially if black on black is your thing.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaF

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really warm. Was scared bc these were delivered in the soft envelope in my mailbox. They have prob given me another inch in height. They feel to be more of a shoe than my birkenstock sandals. I have to be careful about remembering to take them off and switch before going outside. Good tread. Really warm esp on top of foot and toes
customer_reviews.author: Sunkiss

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, super comfy, super cute, and I plan on getting a second pair! I ordered up a half size as I read the reviews and saw that they were slightly snug so I got the 8 instead of a 7 or 7 1/2 like I would for smaller shoes and they fit great. These slippers wear like super expensive ones and I can wear them out of the house like a weirdo that I am. Definitely give them a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Super Fluffy, Slightly Small.
customer_reviews.text: Super fluffy. Super comfy. Love the color. Love the tread, it's sturdy enough for me to take the dog out. One star taken off because they do run slightly small. Maybe half to one full size? I'm a size 6.5 so I ordered a 7. It's almost too small. My toes are the the tippy top of the footbed, and my heel is very close to hanging off. I wish I had ordered the 8 instead. But I can make them work. When it comes time to reorder- I will definitely size up!
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and it keeps my feet warm. I wear them every day, all day. I love them so much I ended up getting 2 more pairs. I think it's more comfortable then my uggs slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure these would be good for the price, but I love them so much I'll probably get a second pair. I was worried they'd be too stuff, but the loosened up within 5 minutes of wear. I love the hard sole. I love that I can run outside if I need to, though I try not to bring the outside in. I was going to buy some UGGs, glad I have these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Staple
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are amazing, comfortable, sturdy, perfect for indoor use. I bought these to replace my overly priced Ugh slippers and these are so much better at a fraction of the cost! They do run small because of all the faux fur, I am a 8.5/9 and I sized up to a 10. They fit perfect with and without thick socks and the back of my foot doesn’t stick out! I have been wearing them non-top for the past 6 weeks while WFM and they’re still like new.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Warm Shoe/Slipper for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I was traveling North for the Holidays (I live in Florida) and they were perfect. Just got out of a cast for a broken foot and couldn't fit my bad foot in a regular shoe. These were super comfortable, super supportive and honestly better than I expected. I saw the SAME EXACT shoe/slipper on the UGG website for over $100 more because they had the UGG name. You really won't be disappointed. Great outside or inside shoe. Also, not heavy but not flimsy either.
customer_reviews.author: oh2btan

customer_reviews.title: A great slipper!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers!! I’ve had them now for almost a year and I wear them exclusively as indoor house shoes. They’re very comfortable! At first I thought the sole was a bit too firm but I actually prefer it now to a soft-soles slipper because it has lasted so long. I got my SO a different pair that have memory foam type soles and his are super flat but mine are still nice and thick, they haven’t compressed at all. I think I’ll probably have to replace them at the end of this year just because the faux fur gets dirty just because feet, and I think I’ll get the pink ones this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, but the material used makes it feel very cheap. I guess I shouldn't have expected too much with the price point, but a girl can hope. After wearing them around the house, I noticed a small hole starting to form near the ball of my foot. For only wearing them around the house, I was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm & fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. My old slippers wore out two years ago and it's taken this long to find the perfect replacement. I usually wear a 6 1/2 D (wide) but these don't come in half-sizes or wide widths so I ordered a 7. They're nice and warm and fit perfectly. They stay snug on my feet and have enough room to wear thick socks. I like them so much I plan on ordering a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: idealady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Pink Clog But Not Warm Enough
customer_reviews.text: I am a true size 7. I'm glad I took reviewer's advice and ordered a size up and it fits just right. The clog itself is cute, the outside fur lining is soft and well made. I am a real big faux fur fan so the inside lining was an issue for me. It's faux fur but it's not the same material as the outside fur lining. The inside lining looks and feel more like the stuff you find inside a stuff animal. I am extremely disappointed. The inside sole has similar material as the outside lining. The bottom sole is foam/plastic like. I wish the inside faux fur lining were thicker and softer. Return.
customer_reviews.author: Su Tran (ShuShu)

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog so I often have to run out to the gate to get a package from a delivery person, and with a gravel driveway I need slippers that offer protection! Just the thing. Another reviewer mentioned that these were good for running out to the mailbox - just my thing! Thank you reviewer! I ordered my size and found them a bit loose, but a pair of socks solves that problem. Warm and cozy with a very good sole!
customer_reviews.author: Restfinder

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought 9 pairs for Christmas gifts, nobody was disappointed. Everyone thought they ran a tad(about a half size) small. But , I knew that from the reviews before I purchased. They all love them for comfort, easy on/easy off, bonus... you can wear them outside to get the mail or take the dog out quickly. I highly recommend along with the o others I gifted them to
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Partington

customer_reviews.title: aturdy soles; wear socks to prolong wear/prevent odor
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! Perfect for taking the dog or trash out bc of the sturdy rubber sole. Just ge sure to wear socks if you keep them on for any length of time bc they warm up bare feet and if they sweat the sweat will make these wear out quickly and get funky/stinky inside. Socks really delay need for replacements!
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter didn't ask for very much this year for Christmas. Slippers were one of the few things on her list. So I wanted something a little nicer than ordinary and something with a sole she could where outside. These looked like they would feel the bill. She was really please with these. She says they are comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne de Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great quality slipper, size down at least one size!
customer_reviews.text: My friend made the mistake of ordering these in her usual size (8), and they were much too small. She gave them to me and they fit well (I am typically a size 6). I wore them almost daily for over a year! Despite the sizing issue, these slippers are comfortable and a good alternative to the much pricier Ugg option. I recently ordered a second pair to replace my first pair which had gone through normal wear and tear. Highly recommend, just size down at least one size!
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Size up, love them!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are great! I bought the kirkland brand from Costco then realized they used real sheepskin and freaked out! I wanted these since they are cruelty free. They are perfect! Super high quality and well made. I Have somewhat chubbier feet, and I wear a size 8 in shoes - I ordered a size 9 in these and they fit PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Nadiya

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant to buy, used to my Ugg’s
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these because I’m used to very similar style slippers but made by Ugg. I finally bought these and was very pleasantly surprised by how comfy and warm they are! Obviously it’s not real sheep skin inside but they are just as soft and comfortable and way more affordable. If I had these first I would never have spent the money on uggs. You can’t really go wrong with these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C Gowell

customer_reviews.title: Shlippers...comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Update....first pair I sized up but they were too large. Second pair my usual size which is perfect. Original review...Attractive and well made. These are a cross between shoes and slippers. Sturdy bottoms. I sized up. If i hadn't i think they would have been short by the heel. What i really like is they don't make that sliding, shuffling sounds like slippers make. Have had these for a while now and they still look and feel great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gobi55

customer_reviews.title: Definitely purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I buy one pair every year, they are comfy and warm and made for going outside to grab the dog lol my dogs unfortunately love these slippers as well, hence my repeat purchasing. I found my last pair strewn about my yard lol I don’t mind getting them every year they are so comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, comfy, sturdy, warm and good quality. I wore mine literally every single day all day long because I work from home, so to get fresh ones the following winter is likely for me because I want them to be cute and fresh again but for the $20 price I do not mind. Great. I'll buy more for sure. Actually, I bought some similar Jessica Simpson ones that got holes in soles within a month. They were also more money. BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy warm
customer_reviews.text: These are similar to what I’ve had but they are shorter in length and wider. There is no arch support and the foot is very firm. What I do like is that they are in shoe size rather than combined sizes like most slippers, which never fit me because my foot is the smaller of a combined size so they are too big and never fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: So far so very good. I’ve been wanting slippers like these for ages but uggs are too expensive. These have a great sturdy sole theyre soft and very comfortable. I’m really really happy with them they’re perfect and exactly what I was looking for. I’m just hopping they won’t fall apart in a month lol
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love my slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers Most ones that you find are usually weak from the bottom but the built in platform is what makes them incredible and strong you don’t have to worry about stepping in small puddles or anything like that I also like how warm and cozy they make my feet feel only thing is it can get them a little to warm and my feet start sweating so you are definitely better off wearing them with a light pair of socks but I’m glad I purchased them in time for winter Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The energizer slippers :)
customer_reviews.text: These are some sturdy slippers- the soles are like wearing boots, but without the weight! These aren’t fluffy and soft so much as cozy and durable. I can wear them all day cleaning, doing laundry, etc, and have no foot fatigue, or signs of wear on the soles. Just ordered them in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Still Holding up a Year Later!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers for my mom a year ago, and they're still holding up great! They have a really nice, heavy tread on the bottom that helps them be a functional shoe both in and house and running to the mailbox. The fur has held up well too, it's still as soft as the day they came in the mail. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of slippers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pair of slippers!!! They are very comfortable, they have a hard sole so u can wear outside if needed and keep your feet nice and toasty!!! Plus, I've washed mine three times and they have come out looking brand new again!!! Definitely recommend these for those with cold feet...lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers as a gift for Christmas, and needless to say my mother loves these. I always loved these slippers growing up and they are extremely comfortable. They have a rubber bottom so that they don't get soaked like traditional slippers, they are perfect for going out on the deck in the morning or afternoon. These are exactly how they look in the picture and they are precise on size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: They're very pretty! They definitely run small though, so go up one size. Im usually an 8 so I ordered a 9, but felt like i didn't have much space so I returned it and went up two sizes. But one size up should do. These are a little hard to walk on though, or at least at first, then you kinda' get use to it. I wish they weren't too stiff and have a good arch support or flexible to walk but overall, I love them. Prettiest slippers I've had, to be used both indoor and outdoor!
customer_reviews.author: Ellee's

customer_reviews.title: Do not Size Up if you have narrow or average feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Do not size up, they will stretch to your usual size in a month or so. I normally wear 8.5 ordered 9 , they were fine until they stretched out. They will feel loose . So order your normal size if you have narrow or average feet
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: ORDER IN A BIGGER SIZE in this color..
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many of these in the past in the same size but this particular one is extremely smaller for some strange reason. Upon sticking my foot into the left one, I felt a prick under the bottom of my foot when I walked around in it.. I took it off and I haven't worn them since.. Waste of money and I'm totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them but do size up
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They look like the picture. They are very comfy and so soft! I wish the bottoms were a different material but I'm sure they are still fine outdoors! When I first put them on I thought they weren't wide enough but after a few minutes they were perfect! I listened to other reviews and ordered bigger then usual... I'm an 8 but ordered a 10 I'm glad I did. They fit perfect but would of been to small at an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Erika bishop

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wide foot!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 3 stars because these aren’t for wide feet and most slippers like these run large without ever saying so. I gave these to my daughter because I figured it was more of a hassle to return than what it’s worth. I would not purchase again unless I knew for sure the person had a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kev&Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, awesome house slipper!
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. I’m someone who really reads reviews for everything and these reviews are accurate... they are great quality, and perfect fit. I’m Normally a size 7.5 and I sized up to an 8. They got perfect with and without socks. Very cozy material on the inside, supportive and comfy, and the bottom is sturdy enough to be worn outside. These are definitely an Ugg slipper dupe. A win in my book, I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Not a dupe for the Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some affordable slippers similar to the popular Ugg style that I liked, these were not it. They felt very lightweight and cheaply made, so I returned. Costco has the best duplicate of these Ugg style slippers in the fall/winter time, high quality, won't fall apart or wear down on the heel and the rubber sole has a bit more of a sturdy weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: they provide great support, and are warm
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9, and ordered a size 9. They arrived quickly. They seem shorter than a size 9, and are definitely narrow. On the plus size, they provide great support, and are warm. My feet stay cold year round. I will wear them to break them in, and keep them. They are very well made too. The seams are very stable, and they are absolutely beautiful. I just wish that they were bigger. The next time I order them, I will order a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Rita H.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these slippers for about a week now so I can't speak too much about them except that they are very adorable in person and super comfortable. The color is just what I expected and the amount of fur inside the slipper is full and plush. I'd given them a whole five stars except for the fact that for me the perfect slipper would be entirely closed in. I'll follow up once I've worn them a while.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these slippers however they run extremely small. I thought they were very light and seemed cheaply made so I have returned the product and will continue my slipper hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice 20 bucks can not go wrong👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: So I wear Bearpaw uggs Bobs Sketchers every year I buy a few new pairs of these type of shoes and this is the first time I decided to buy $20 dollar unbranded fur mules. Hope they last but for now they are amazing comfortable soft and super cute. If u want my advice BUY THEM CANT GO WRONG FOR 20 bucks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kjade

customer_reviews.title: Stretches Out
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable, but I after about 1-2 weeks, I could not climb stairs without them falling off my feet and tumbling to the bottom of the stairs. I was afraid I would fall, so I cannot wear them. I'll try to find someone with a bigger foot to give them to.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for a pair I’ve had by another brand. So far, so good. I would agree that you should size up. I normally wear wide width shoes and these fit just fine. I appreciate how soft they are and the grip on the bottom seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: mamavee

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best slippers I have ever owned! Strong support and very soft and cozy. Great traction on the bottom if you're like me and wear slippers to take the garbage out in the rain. I would highly recommend them! I'm a size 8.5/9 I ordered a 9 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilfinger

customer_reviews.title: really happy with these
customer_reviews.text: really happy with these. i've had them for a couple months now. they are holding up well even tho my 100 lb puppy likes to carry them around in her mouth sometimes. they are comfy, warm, and durable bc they have a really decent sole. my fave part is that they don't lose their shape unlike some slippers which over time end up pushing your foot into weird directions. these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Land Atoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these to anyone. I purchased these as a gift for my mother for Christmas, and have since initiated the return process. They look very similar to some AirWalk slippers my mom used to have. However, the bottoms are a cheap plastic, and there is zero cushion on the inside. If comfort isn't key and you're just looking for something to wear around the house, they might be a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable but are not true to size. I wear a 9-9.5 and I ordered a 10 just to have extra room and my heel still hangs off the back. I am returning and ordering another pair because they are super comfy! Just be mindful of sizes when ordering. Will update once I receive a pair that fits
customer_reviews.author: N1262

customer_reviews.title: Yes these run small!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews I was hesitant to order a size 8 as I run closer to 7 than 7- 1/2. Taking advice from others I did order an 8 and am very glad I did. I have less than 1/2" of heel space. That being said, these are awesome slippers! The sole is heavy enough to walk outside in and the lining is comfy soft and is holding up very well. (especially since I wear them nightly!) :) I would recommend but please order the next size up from what you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Lovely slide in slipper with rugged sole for outdoor wear and soft furry lining that keeps my toes warm. Slip on slippers with an open heel are better for me as I’m lazy and will hold up looking good much longer considering older pairs with squished down backs.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi-chan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is perfect. I didn't pay any mind to the suggestions from other reviewers who said to size up but these fit really well. I normally wear a size 8-8.5 but I took a chance and ordered the 8 and the fit is very comfortable. I don't like my feet swimming in slippers so these worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Googy Meinhold

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find what I wanted and theses looked like they would do the job
customer_reviews.text: Theses are okay, I couldn't find what I wanted and theses looked like they would do the job. I've had them about a month and the inside cushion is already flat and I have twisted my ankle twice...SO the hunt goes on!!! Update.... I've had these a mere 5 months and the insole are flat and hard, now there are holes where the big toe goes... guess these are not made of a good leather for slippers... so need to get a new pair....;/
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: surprised and pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased bear paw similar slippers. decided to take a chance with this slipper and save $30.00. Wow...fit is perfect and they are so similar to bear paw I couldn't believe it. very happy I took a chance! Ordering a 2nd pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy! A Win for a Mother’s Day Gift 💗
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Mother’s Day gift and she absolutely loves them. She has to let her dog out a lot, as she is older and these help her back and are really soft and comfortable. Love the tread on the bottom so she can go outside and inside and not trip. Fit perfectly too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ITGirl273

customer_reviews.title: Love love love...
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. Boyfriend got me a fluffy pink robe for my birthday and these match it perfectly. They are super warm. And the sole is super chunky and thick so it hard some height too. Love them and great price! Love in these when I’m home!
customer_reviews.author: M, Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously in love with these slippers, I live in a cold college dorm and am always freezing. They are perfect to wear around my dorm and for a quick walk down to the laundry. I wear them 24/7 and will be purchasing another color for home! Highly recommend these for anyone with feet that are always cold!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is easily my 4th, maybe 5th pair of these over the last 4 years. Not because they wear out, but because I often wear them outside when I do farm chores so they get pretty gross. I had tried washing them and they weren't quite the same after, however I still love them. They are comfortable, warm and have a thick sole (which is hard to find on women's slippers).
customer_reviews.author: Madhatter

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this product as a gift but didn’t want to give it to the recipient because it felt a little “cheap “. I ended up keeping them for myself and I am really surprised at how much I like them. They’re very soft and comfortable and honestly great quality for the price point. Not to mention, they’re super cute. I don’t know how long they'll last but for $20 I don’t mind and would definitely re-order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and pink<3
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these bad boys right now! Winter is coming, get yourself a pair of these! Super soft, the only thing is the bottom is a tad bit hard, but hey i guess that just means it'll last longer right? Lol. The outside is as soft as the inside, i mostly wear these inside the house, but i take them outside for a spin every now and then and get compliments!
customer_reviews.author: nancy lim

customer_reviews.title: Premium Slipper / Perfect for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product and great quality. Will be buying another pair in different colors. Even my husband loves these as well are so soft ! Slippers is made for comfort with contemporary style. These are made from quality materials for fall / winter. It is great house slippers . I will be interested to see how they hold up as they are stated to be able to be washed in the washer, but not dried in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

product_meta.title: CLPP'LI Womens Slip on Faux Fur Warm Winter Mules Fluffy Suede Comfy Slippers
product_meta.description:
These Clppli slippers is the best slippers for women, which feature a warm faux fur lining and trim, synthetic suede upper, slip on design, and a chunky sole unit. Our women slippers have inner lining that make the fits a size smaller. We recommend ordering a size larger from your typical shoe size.

Clppli ladies slippers is made for comfort with contemporary style. Our lands end slippers is made from quality materials that provide an organic beauty that's wearable year round. It is great house slippers enjoyed by all women. Softness makes the bedroom slippers perfect for keeping your feet warm while doing. This perfect slippers will be an unique present for your Mum in cold days or a great gift for her in the coming Christmas. It will be also best present to strengthen your family relationships. 

This totes slippers need hand or machine wash, gentle in cold water with like colors. Rinse carefully in cool clear water. Air dry flat. Do not use automatic dryer for these womens slippers.
